1.summary:
Here's a summary of the resume:

*   **Name:** Himan Manduja

*   **Skills:**
    *   Backend & DevOps (Flask, REST API design, SQLAlchemy, MySQL, Docker, GitHub Actions CI/CD, AWS (EC2, S3, IAM), Testing & Monitoring)
    *   Programming & Scripting (Python, Java, JavaScript, PHP, C++)
    *   Machine Learning (Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Data Preprocessing, Model Evaluation)
    *   Web Development (React, Vite, HTML, CSS)
    *   APIs (OpenAI, Hugging Face, Gemini, Anthropic)
    *   Tools (Git/GitHub, VS Code, Postman, Docker)

*   **Work Experience (Projects):**
    *   **NutriChef - Al-Driven Meal Planning Web Application:** Built a full-stack web app to manage recipes, allergens, and meal planning. Integrated AI/ML components, designed RESTful API backend, and implemented unit/integration tests.
    *   **FertiliZen - Fertilizer Recommendation Web App:** Developed React + Flask app predicting fertilizer needs. Trained a stacking ensemble model, packaged trained models for deployment, and documented EDA.
    *   **Butterfly Prediction – Species Classification Web App:** Fine-tuned MobileNetV2 CNN to classify butterfly species, applied augmentations and callbacks, and integrated into Flask REST API + React frontend for real-time image predictions.

*   **Education:**
    *   Bachelor of Science with Honors in Software Engineering, Cardiff Metropolitan University, 2024-2025
    *   Diploma in Computer Science and Software Engineering, Cardiff Metropolitan University, 2024
